title: I got the 10 year-Anniversary icon, but I already have riot kayle and dind't get a mystery skin.
body:
I dont know if I am supposed to get the mystery skin and the icon at the same time, but a friend of mine got the icon and the skin at the same time, and he dindt have riot kayle already. I already had riot kayle.
 Am I supposed to be waiting on my mystery skin or was I already supposed to have a mystery skin by now

(sorry for bad English)

replies.body: Gifts are being sent out seperately, and many players haven't received their mystery gift yet.  Hit up our [support banner](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/227317608--Sept-14-Anniversary-gifts-are-currently-being-distributed-You-may-not-receive-them-right-away-so-please-be-patient-) for updates as we continue to roll out gifts.  Patience!

The amount of 'Thank you gift' questions that you have to awnser...

I am praying for your soul, Porocles.
Know that we appreciate you. :^)

https://memecrunch.com/meme/7KU7/let-us-pray/image.jpg?w=500&c=1
Are you still sending gifts? It's been three days since Sunday and I haven't received it yet. Sorry for the question, but I'm just interested.
